what: A Helping Hand in McConkey Land
title: A Helping Hand in McConkey Land
text: bladdr ‘miscellaneous’ toolbox made McConkey lab, useful many routine lab tasks. vision package can automate everyday tasks small functions don’t try much. Larger, full fledged ideas pulled packages, like amplify gp.

title: A Helping Hand in McConkey Land
text: Currently, bladdr two ‘groups’ functions EDA functions, take SummarizedExperiment object visualize expression gene(s) across optional strata Helpers, like dilute, make_pipette_vol, theme_tufte, others.

title: A Helping Hand in McConkey Land
text: can install development version GitHub :

Add a new targets 'project' — add_project
text: project Character. name project. include .R.

title: Add a new targets 'project' — add_project
text: function produce following files: ./R/targets/project.R ./R/functions/project.R also update () make.R script include new project, add _targets.yaml file via tar_config_set. Note already created, running script create another directory, stores, contain another subdirectory name project.

what: Calculate dilution from known concentrations — dilute
title: Calculate dilution from known concentrations — dilute
text: Calculate dilution known concentrations

title: Calculate dilution from known concentrations — dilute
code: dilute(c1, c2 = min(c1), v2, round_for_pipettes = TRUE, quiet = FALSE)

title: Calculate dilution from known concentrations — dilute
text: c1 Numeric. Initial concentration sample. c2 Numeric. Target concentration sample. v2 Numeric. Target final volume sample. round_for_pipettes = TRUE, assumes volume mL. round_for_pipettes Logical. TRUE, rounds values accuracy standard pipettes using make_pipette_vol. quiet Logical. FALSE, warn dilution impossible without concentrating sample.

title: Calculate dilution from known concentrations — dilute
text: named list, sample_to_add volume sample add, add_to volume dilute sample .

title: Get a directory or file from the GBCI SharePoint — get_gbci
code: get_gbci(path, dest = NULL, overwrite = FALSE, create_dir = TRUE, drive = NULL)  get_gbci_file(   path,   dest = NULL,   overwrite = FALSE,   create_dir = TRUE,   drive = NULL )  get_gbci_dir(   path,   dest = NULL,   overwrite = FALSE,   create_dir = TRUE,   drive = NULL )

title: Get a directory or file from the GBCI SharePoint — get_gbci
text: path Path file directory SharePoint dest put file, name . Defaults tempfile/dir overwrite Logical. files overwritten aready exist? create_dir Logical. destination directory created exist? drive Optional. Microsoft365R::ms_drive. Can passed parent functions avoid multiple calls, can faster.

text: tibble

title: Calculate and fit MTT model from absorbance data — mtt_calc
